about_the_game:
In the ‘80s, there were no aquaparks in your country. Or, at least, that was the case until you opened one yourself. As the owner, you want to memorize this moment and record everything on your VHS tapes. Everything is perfect, people are happy and have fun all day. However, at night, you start to notice something unsettling, creepy, dark…

Game features:

  • Dark Atmosphere - immerse yourself in the thrilling atmosphere of an aquapark, where not everything is as it seems.
  • Aquapark Management - manage your aquapark, serve the customers, restock the shelves, and record everything.
  • Day and Night - talk to happy customers during the day and embrace darkness while being alone at night.
  • Blissful Dream - let the customers in, check their tickets, sell toys and swimsuits, sometimes clean the aquapark. It’s a dream job…during the day.
  • Recurring Nightmare - check cameras, patrol the aquapark, and search for anything unusual. Even if everything is unusual…
  • Strange Events - for a second you thought that you saw a head between balls. Was it real? Or was it just your imagination? You can never be sure.
  • Secrets and Mysteries - discover hidden places, stories, and secrets of your aquapark.

Aquapark:

You built your aquapark yourself. Or you paid for it, to be specific. You thought of everything - water slides, playgrounds, sports swimming pool etc. However, as you keep an eye on your facility, you start to notice new sections. Hidden rooms, sections that definitely weren’t included in the project. There is only one way to find out what they are.

Unravel the mystery:

As more and more unsettling events occur, you are desperate to find out what’s happening. Some NPCs may know more than you could imagine. Talk to them, make your choices and discover the true cause of strange events in your property. Will you be able to unearth the truth?

name: AquaDark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: AquaDark is a first-person horror game with management elements set in the ‘80s. As an aquapark owner, players have to serve customers, sell wares, record everything, and solve the mystery behind strange events in the aquapark.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
